description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4kulf","text":"This protocol details the preparation of cryosection samples and laser capture microdissection (LCM) samples collected with a MMI Laser-Microdissection device for MS/MS analysis. {"blocks":[{"key":"mle3","text":"Add trypsin stock solution to each sample:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27e8g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6roh1","text":"LCM samples: add   to LCM samples (contains ca.  trypsin).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cm9ih","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2si6f","text":"Cryosection samples: add  l to reference samples (contains   trypsin).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"6ED10E643B9911ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"guid":"6ED10F233B9911ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"6ED10FB03B9911ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1.2","error":false,"guid":"6ED110383B9911ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31kth","text":"Digest overnight at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"ADCDF2183B9911ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5opon","text":"Spin the tubes down quickly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ptm7","text":"Place tubes onto magnetic stage and transfer supernatant  into a new    Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"143F8DBF3B9A11ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mv4u","text":"       Add ddH2O to magnetic beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8je5b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rseh","text":"LCM samples: add  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cenvo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"doflo","text":"Cryosection samples: add  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ia55","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"354B0DAE3B9A11ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"70","error":false,"guid":"354B0EC23B9A11ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8r6u","text":"Sonicate for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"6828D1633B9A11ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"de6ou","text":"Spin down quickly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f0g8e","text":"Combine supernatant in the same Eppendorf tube as in step 1 above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bf8ca","text":"      Quench digestion by adding 5% TFA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5edfe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8at4","text":"LCM samples: add  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9lh5u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfsp3","text":"Cryosection samples: add  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"0E3AE4363B9B11ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"26","error":false,"guid":"0E3AE5703B9B11ECB3090A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1fg8r","text":"Check pH.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kadt","text":"Snap freeze samples and place open collection tube in a vacuum evaporator (until completely dry).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dn6qj","text":"Freeze samples or resuspend.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ctb1o","text":"For resuspension: Prepare iRTs in MS buffer at a ratio of 1:20.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0pnr","text":"Resuspend samples in   (LCM)  or   (cryo) MS buffer + iRT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2arnm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"47DAF9403B9D11EC810F71C5912C5D5E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"4B6706303B9D11EC810F71C5912C5D5E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dhcqe","text":"Sonicate for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"buaf1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"50DDA5103B9D11EC810F71C5912C5D5E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"57AE07903B9D11EC810F71C5912C5D5E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"baam2","text":"Spin down quickly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8lud7","text":"Transfer the whole sample into a Waters glass vial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
